Caption: Target lit with TAG, bring the heat.
Name: Hail_9

Caption: Raining down hellfire on narc'd target.
Name: Hail_14

Caption: Cold, and cool. I'll take it over cooking!
Name: Hail_20

Caption: Finally, a break from the heat.
Name: Hail_21

Caption: This… is a great place for alpha strikes.
Name: Hail_22

Caption: Looks like I can put the cap back on the override button.
Name: Hail_23

Caption: Living here, hell no? Fighting here, sounds grand.
Name: Hail_24

Caption: I'll take ice and snow, over a shutdown mech any day of the week.
Name: Hail_26

Caption: This place is a dump, but at least we can let loose.
Name: Hail_27

Caption: Commander, why are we here in this crappy place?
Name: Hail_29

Caption: Only thing to look forward to here, is the combat.
Name: Hail_30

Caption: Blake's Blood, this place is a dump.
Name: Hail_31

Caption: Life can survive in the strangest places.
Name: Hail_32

Caption: These canyons remind me of the blood pits…
Name: Hail_33

Caption: What is this place… it feels….
Name: Hail_36

Caption: Now this brings me back to Galatea.
Name: Hail_37

Caption: Never seen so much kindling in one place…
Name: Hail_38

Caption: Let's light this place on fire.
Name: Hail_40

Caption: We don't pay out for all these trees I am about to crisp… right?
Name: Hail_41

Caption: This place is about to get a whole lot redder.
Name: Hail_42

Caption: Keep your eyes on the trees, easy to hide in there.
Name: Hail_43

Caption: Its not so bad here, is it?
Name: Hail_44

Caption: Focus on the mission, the view won't be here for long anyhow.
Name: Hail_45

Caption: Ya know, I wouldn't mind taking a break for once.
Name: Hail_46

Caption: Even a place like this becomes a battlefield.
Name: Hail_47

Caption: It’s a shame this place is about to be lit on fire.
Name: Hail_48

Caption: Keep focused, no time for site seeing…
Name: Hail_49

Caption: I admit it, this place ain't too bad.
Name: Hail_51

Caption: Watch your footing, sliding in +20 tons is rarely a good time.
Name: Hail_53

Caption: Huh. Just like home. But much worse.
Name: Hail_54

Caption: Not a lot of life around here, soon to be even less.
Name: Hail_56

Caption: This is a hell hole… don't mind it though.
Name: Hail_57

Caption: I wonder if we'll be able to hear their screams?
Name: Hail_58

Caption: Reminds me of Galatea… minus a livable atmosphere.
Name: Hail_59

Caption: This place smells like piss and sweat.
Name: Hail_60

Caption: Looking outside, all of a sudden a sweat stained cockpit doesn't seem so bad.
Name: Hail_61

Caption: Ooooo! I'd love to see what would happen to a mech in one of those. Volunteers?
Name: Hail_62

Caption: I'm salivating over here, let's get this show on the road.
Name: Hail_64

Caption: This better not turn out to be a non-combat op.
Name: Hail_66

Caption: I feel it... Today is another day of the legend of Hail.
Name: Hail_67

Caption: Let me take point commander, trigger finger's itchy.
Name: Hail_68

Caption: You won't regret this commander. I'll crush all ya set my sights on.
Name: Hail_69

Caption: Enough sitting around, theres mechs to slag.
Name: Hail_70

Caption: As you request, I shall deliver.
Name: Hail_79

Caption: Target engaged, their probably pissing themselves.
Name: Hail_82

Caption: Time to write another page in the book of Hail.
Name: Hail_83

Caption: Let's blow them to hell. Yeah!
Name: Hail_94

Caption: You're not making any sense, unable to comply.
Name: Hail_140

Caption: Is your head a shell commander, no can do!
Name: Hail_141

Caption: You couldn't pay me enough c-bills!
Name: Hail_145

Caption: No way for me to make it there commander.
Name: Hail_148

Caption: Can't do it, route is blocked.
Name: Hail_149

Caption: At navpoint Mind if I shoot something while I'm here?
Name: Hail_158

Caption: Arghh this isn't how it ends for me!
Name: Hail_159

Caption: Mech's going critical. Not like this!
Name: Hail_160

Caption: Damn, they got one of us!
Name: Hail_161

Caption: Crap. Just you and I left commander.
Name: Hail_165

Caption: Frack! Just you and me left. 50 credits says I get more kills!
Name: Hail_166

Caption: Just us commander, let's bring the pain.
Name: Hail_167

Caption: It will take more than that to end my legend! Punching out!
Name: Hail_168

Caption: I'm burning up in here, gotta eject!
Name: Hail_170

Caption: If I stay I'm dead, punching out.
Name: Hail_172

Caption: FRACK! Another hit and I'm wasted, I'm out.
Name: Hail_173

Caption: Frackin wannabe critical hit me, I'm pulling the pin.
Name: Hail_174

Caption: Another page in the legend of Hail.
Name: Hail_179

Caption: Beautiful how they fizzle out like that!
Name: Hail_180

Caption: Mech's going hot, go go go!
Name: Hail_184

Caption: Move out of blast zone, preys gone critical.
Name: Hail_186

Caption: Nice, watch out for the fireworks!
Name: Hail_187

Caption: Now that's a kill, eye on the reactor commander.
Name: Hail_188

Caption: That pilot won't see another day…
Name: Hail_190

Caption: So many targets, so little time.
Name: Hail_191

Caption: Ping ahead! Let's light it up.
Name: Hail_192

Caption: More things to kill on radar.
Name: Hail_196

Caption: Heavy metal spotted, let me tear him apart commander!
Name: Hail_207

Caption: Battlemech spotted! Time to earn my reputation.
Name: Hail_209

Caption: Mech spotted, permission to engage commander?
Name: Hail_210

Caption: Armour inbound. Permission to use these feet of mine sir?
Name: Hail_218

Caption: Mosquitoes in the air, let's swat em!
Name: Hail_198

Caption: VTOL ahead, ya love to see em fall?
Name: Hail_200

Caption: FRAKK! I'm being torn apart here.
Name: Hail_222

Caption: Frakk, they have a big bite!
Name: Hail_224

Caption: This is worse than the blood pits, they're tearing into me!
Name: Hail_225

Caption: These wannabees, just blasted out a component.
Name: Hail_227

Caption: Blake's blood, my left side just got torn off!
Name: Hail_230

Caption: There goes my right arm, someone grab it for me?
Name: Hail_231

Caption: Nothing left in my right torso, cept a hole!
Name: Hail_233

Caption: Do you really wanna get on my bad side?
Name: Hail_234

Caption: You don't pay me enough to use me as target practice.
Name: Hail_235

Caption: Check your fire, before I don't check mine!
Name: Hail_236

Caption: You hit me one more time…
Name: Hail_237
